  17. 2405.20996v1 KeldyshQFT: A C++ codebase for real-frequency multiloop functional renormalization group and parquet computations of the single-impurity Anderson model (arXiv)

  18. 2405.21006v1 Magnetotransport Properties of Ferromagnetic/Antiferromagnetic Superlattices: Probing the role of induced magnetization in antiferromagnetic layer (arXiv)

  19. 2405.20353v1 Teaching ideal quantum measurement, from dynamics to interpretation (arXiv)

  21. 2405.20384v1 Recurrent neural network wave functions for Rydberg atom arrays on kagome lattice (arXiv)

  22. 2405.20544v1 Metal Assisted Chemical Etching patterns at a Ge/Cr/Au interface modulated by the Euler instability (arXiv)

  23. 2405.20597v1 Double-sided van der Waals epitaxy of topological insulators across an atomically thin membrane (arXiv)

  24. 2405.20714v1 Large low-field magnetocaloric response in a ferromagnetic gadolinium orthophosphate (arXiv)
